languages.text: "Сенешаль, говорят, опять недавно устроил публичную выволочку старшим офицерам. За что — не знаю, да, собственно, Версериану хватает и мелочи, чтобы взбучку закатить..."

traits.locale_text: [Draft] А я вам говорю, что лазган лучшее оружие придуманное империумом, простой, надежный, с ним даже огрин справится!

languages.text: "I heard the Seneschal gave the senior officers another public dressing-down recently. I don't know what it was for this time, but Werserian would latch onto any slip-up as an excuse to give someone an earful..."
languages.original_text: "Сенешаль, говорят, опять недавно устроил публичную выволочку старшим офицерам. За что — не знаю, да, собственно, Версериану хватает и мелочи, чтобы взбучку закатить..."

traits.locale_text: "I heard the Seneschal gave the senior officers another public dressing-down recently. I don't know what it was for this time, but Werserian would latch on to any slip-up as an excuse to give someone an earful..."

"I heard the Seneschal gave the senior officers another public dressing-down recently. I don't know what it was for this time, but Werserian would latch on to any slip-up as an excuse to give someone an earful..."

"I heard the Seneschal gave the senior officers another public dressing-down recently. I don't know what it was for this time, but Werserian would latch on to any slip-up as an excuse to give someone an earful..."

languages.text: "Der Truchsess soll die leitenden Offiziere kürzlich wieder offiziell gemaßregelt haben. Ich weiß nicht, wofür, aber Werserian nutzt jeden Ausrutscher als Ausrede, um jemanden runterzuputzen ..."
languages.original_text: "I heard the Seneschal gave the senior officers another public dressing-down recently. I don't know what it was for this time, but Werserian would latch onto any slip-up as an excuse to give someone an earful..."

traits.locale_text: "Der Truchsess soll die leitenden Offiziere kürzlich wieder offiziell gemaßregelt haben. Ich weiß nicht, wofür, aber Werserian nutzt jeden Ausrutscher als Ausrede, um jemanden runterzuputzen ..."

languages.text: « Il paraît que le sénéchal a encore sermonné les officiers supérieurs en public, l'autre jour. Je ne sais pas ce qu'il leur reprochait cette fois-ci, mais Werserian prendrait n'importe quelle broutille comme prétexte pour faire la leçon à quelqu'un... »
languages.original_text: "I heard the Seneschal gave the senior officers another public dressing-down recently. I don't know what it was for this time, but Werserian would latch onto any slip-up as an excuse to give someone an earful..."

traits.locale_text: « Il paraît que le sénéchal a encore sermonné les officiers supérieurs en public, l'autre jour. Je ne sais pas ce qu'il leur reprochait cette fois-ci, mais Werserian prendrait n'importe quelle broutille comme prétexte pour faire la leçon à quelqu'un... »

languages.text: “我听说，总领最近又当众训斥了高级军官。我不知道这次是因为什么事情，但韦尔森长官总是会抓住别人一丁点失误，以此当做借口，训斥别人……”
languages.original_text: "I heard the Seneschal gave the senior officers another public dressing-down recently. I don't know what it was for this time, but Werserian would latch onto any slip-up as an excuse to give someone an earful..."

traits.locale_text: “我听说，总领最近又当众训斥了高级军官。我不知道这次是因为什么事情，但韦尔森长官总是会抓住别人一丁点失误，以此当做借口，训斥别人……”

languages.text: 「最近、家令長から高官が公的にお叱りを受けたそうだ。今回のはどうしてか知らないが、ウェルザリアンはどんな些細なミスにもお小言を言うからな…」
languages.original_text: "I heard the Seneschal gave the senior officers another public dressing-down recently. I don't know what it was for this time, but Werserian would latch onto any slip-up as an excuse to give someone an earful..."

traits.locale_text: 「最近、家令長から高官が公的にお叱りを受けたそうだ。今回のはどうしてか知らないが、ウェルザリアンはどんなささいなミスにもお小言を言うからな…」
「最近、家令長から高官が公的にお叱りを受けたそうだ。今回のはどうしてか知らないが、ウェルザリアンはどんな些細なミスにもお小言を言うからな…」

languages.text: «Me he enterado de que el Senescal ha echado otra bronca a los oficiales superiores en público hace poco. No sé por qué ha sido esta vez, pero a Werserian le sirve cualquier error como excusa para reprender a alguien...».
languages.original_text: "I heard the Seneschal gave the senior officers another public dressing-down recently. I don't know what it was for this time, but Werserian would latch onto any slip-up as an excuse to give someone an earful..."

traits.locale_text: «Me he enterado de que el Senescal ha echado otra bronca a los oficiales superiores en público hace poco. No sé por qué ha sido esta vez, pero a Werserian le sirve cualquier error como excusa para reprender a alguien...».

languages.text: "Seneşal, geçen gün kıdemli subayları herkesin önünde bir güzel azarlamış. Gene neye kızdı, bilmem ama Werserian'ın affı yoktur. En ufak bir hata görsün, basar fırçayı."
languages.original_text: "I heard the Seneschal gave the senior officers another public dressing-down recently. I don't know what it was for this time, but Werserian would latch onto any slip-up as an excuse to give someone an earful..."

traits.locale_text: "Seneşal, geçen gün kıdemli subayları herkesin önünde bir güzel azarlamış. Gene neye kızdı, bilmem ama Werserian'ın affı yoktur. En ufak bir hata görsün, basar fırçayı."
